long_description: The lightest weight, fully waterproof, insulated jacket in the line, the Arc'teryx Fission SL jacket offers both warmth and waterproof protection. Pit zips and hood extend use as conditions demand. Fission SL is engineered for cold and damp conditions; it's ideal for the stop-and-go pace of skiing and riding. Gore-Tex(R) fabric breathes while blocking wind and water; all seams are sealed for 100% protection with tiny Gore seam tape. Constructed with exclusive laminated Thermatek(TM) non-quilted insulation; it offers downlike softness, warmth and breathability, and it continues to insulate when damp. Micro seam allowances cut down on weight and bulk. Helmet-compatible, insulated and adjustable hood features a laminated brim. Pit zippers prevent overheating and internal moisture buildup during physical intervals or in warm conditions. Features single-hand-adjustable drawcords at hem and hood, and laminated die-cut rip-and-stick cuffs. Laminated handwarmer pockets with water-resistant zippers; 2 large, internal, drop-in mesh pockets. The Arc'teryx Fission SL jacket features an athletic, hip-length fit.
